content: options for a 41 inch cloth size 30 thread and a 72 inch cloth roughly a size 3 thread **materials ** *for 41 inch 104 cm cloth * * 8 balls of coats six cord mercer-crochet green label white or ecru size 30 * steel crochet hook no 11 *for 72 inch 183 cm cloth * * clark s anchor cronita 24 balls of white or ecru or 27 balls of beige shade 84 * size 3 steel crochet hook 2 http //www craftown com/crochet/pat3 htm 3 http //groups yahoo com/group/celtsvintagecrochet/files/pineapple%20tablecloths/
